ISLAND will be coming to Steam shores on August 24! Get ready to experience Setsuna's adventures!

quote.msg:
ISLAND will be coming to Steam shores on August 24! Get ready to experience Setsuna's adventures!

This is an update regarding the status of the Chinese language version of ISLAND.
Currently, the Chinese translation of the game is completed, and the Chinese language version is in the debugging phase.
